title: Pool Party Skins Thread!!!!!!!
body:
As we catch the scent of spring in the air, we all switch towards a particular mindset....and that mindset is....

POOL PARTY SKIN IDEAS! WOO!

That's right folks, any and all ideas you have for a Pool Party skin for a particular champion! Any Champion! All the Champions! Feel free to post a picture you found or that you yourself made. Share your ideas! :)

I'll start:

{{champion:421}} Rek'Sai: She dives underwater whilst underground and has an actual shark fin sticking out. She of course has the most luxurious bikini possible and her tail is tipped with fins.

{{champion:85}} Kennen: For his recall animation, he cannonballs into a pool, shocking himself when he makes contact with the water.

{{champion:267}} Nami: one of my favorite arts of a Pool Party skin idea (not mine, belongs to kyrakuu of deviantart)

http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/020/3/e/pool_party_nami_by_kyrakuu-d732pbn.jpg 

You guys try! :D

replies.body:
Well, going by the people in the Pool Party Ziggs splash art:

Pool Cleaner Yorick? Moonbathing Diana! "I'm Finally Taking A Day Off" Katarina. Darius, Xin Zhao and Garen in matching speedos. Sunburnt Riven (SHE IS SO ANGRY).

I always imagine Riven would have a half-melted popsickle as a sword, full popsickle for her ult. 
I think I got it from this image:

http://i.imgur.com/27ATAcq.png

I mean, hey...melted popsickle, sunburn....maybe Riven is not having a good day at the Pool Party >.<

She needs to get a new VA where she complains about literally everything. "I GOT SUN LOTION IN MY EYES! NOT ON MY ACTUAL SKIN BUT RIGHT IN THE EYES." "AAAA THIS SUNBURN HURTS" "DAMMIT I GOT BLOOD ON MY POPSICKLE" "OW WHY AM I BAREFOOT OW OW OW"
*VFX
Yeah. That'd suck.
Pool Party Kayle http://th08.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2013/204/2/9/lol___summer_kayle_by_enijoi-d6et7rc.jpg

Oooooo pretty 

I hadn't given much thought to Kayle, the parrot coloration on her wings is a really good idea to fit with the theme AND look gorgeous.

Looks sorta like a Blue and Yellow Macaw: http://bransonswildworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/blue-and-gold-macaw.jpg
nicely done wings.

Pool Party Darius... His on his ulti he does a cannonball... enough said
Pool Party Lucian... He uses water guns instead of his handguns
Pool Party Sion... His ultimate could also do the cannonball thing... like he runs and then right at the end when he stops he jumps off a diving board and cannonballs to smash the ground
Pool Party Veigar... His ult is a beachball, his stun is a pool net, and his back animation he could stand next to a must be this tall to go on the ride thing (like a water slide they could do more on it) and he goes "Must be this tall to go on the ride... ARE YOU KIDDING ME?"
Water gun fight bot lane ( {{champion:104}}  vs. {{champion:236}} )
XD well we know that lcuain will win ^^

Love the Veigar recall animation idea! Poor Veig!

All your other ideas are great too. The Darius cannonball ult made all the more sweeter with ShadowKnight's speedo suggestion....>.<
Thresh whips people with a towel with his E.

Ow!
Pleas not a wet one!
Then it wouldn't be nearly as cruel.

As Jinx would put it,
AWWWWH!
"You've fallen apart. What to do with the pieces?" "NOT THE TOWEL! AWWWWWWH!"

What, Jinx don't like getting ass-slapped by a wet towel.
Not sure who would WANT to get hit there by one...

{{champion:412}} Thresh: He should use a lifesaver for his Dark Passage, create a wave for Flay, and perhaps summon an above-ground pool for his ultimate.

{{champion:254}} Vi: Perhaps something like this picture I drew for a contest on the Oceanic server earlier this year? Board shorts, goggles and two big inflatable gloves.

http://fav.me/d8fenj4

The Vi is pretty cool. I think board shorts suit her personality!

There's a pun somewhere in there....

I just thought of another really good one:

{{champion:8}} Vlad: As he lounges back in his splash art, sipping his juice box or perhaps an umbrella'd drink, we can see the fear in the surrounding Yordles' eyes: Vlad will steal your fruit punch!!! But seriously, having Vlad hold a juice box and his Q making a straw sucking sound would be glorious. Add some shades for him to glare over and his pool has him sink into an actual pool and we have a high-sugar skin for the kiddies! :P

{{champion:114}} Pool party Fiora PLZ

http://i.imgur.com/5Z3HRj2.jpg
That would be better with a folded beach umbrella or float noodle instead of a sword.
lol they make it :D
I just want Rek to have a snorkel. That is all I really want. 950 RP totes worth riot
Don't we all?

Pool Party Akali.

Her shroud is a pool, and when she enters, she dives in.
well, nami just got a skin so i don't see this happening any time soon.

Well, yeah, but that doesn't mean it will NEVER happen.

LET ME DREAM GODDAMNIT

eeeeh nope
*turns into a troll-hacking Sion*
Stomp-Stomp-Ult-Ult-Ult-Stomp-knockup-Ult-Stomp KILL!!!
{{champion:14}} Pool Party Sion - he holds a giant "no diving" sign, has hearts all over his swim trunks. His ult looks like he's barreling through water.
Can he hold megaphone like pool party Taric :D

wasn't suggesting a Pool-Party Sion...
was saying how much a pain in the ass a troll-hacker is on League...

I know, _I_ was suggesting it :P

Doesn't make him any less troll

**_was saying how much a pain in the ass a troll-hacker is on League..._**
ACTUALY READ THIS TIME.

Ok I guess I don't know what a "troll-hacker" is.

This is supposed to be a silly thread. I was just trying to be silly. The Caps Lock is unnecessary.
Anyone else agree that Nami needs to give that floatie to someone else? She's a half-fish for crhist sakes, it's not like she's gonna drown!
That's like the funniest part though. The inner tube makes the skin! :P
Omg that face is so creepy.
